title: General
fullText:
The requirements of this Clause (Clause 2.11) apply to permanently installed ELV wiring that is reticulated from stand-alone supplies to items of permanently installed ELV equipment, e.g. wiring from external transformers or back-up battery supplies to ELV examination lights and operating lights.
Exception:
1   These requirements do not apply to ELV circuits that are reticulated between separate parts of a single equipment system, e.g. patient monitoring systems, telephone systems, nurse call systems, surgical lights and remote ELV supply/control units supplied as a system from a single manufacturer.
